resources.string: Numerology uses a person\'s birthday to calculate his or her life path.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn to be independent and to stand on your own two feet, to find and do your own thing.
•Attempt an undertaking that\'s never been tried before
•Evelop leadership qualities, self-sufficiency, and a take-charge attitude

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn to be a peacemaker, a diplomat.
•Be sensitive to others\' feelings.
•Learn how to please through charm, sweetness, friendliness, helpfulness, and considerration.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn to be a gracious host or hostess.
•Develop an appreciation for beauty and beautiful things.
•Not scatter your energies or waste your talents.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn order and self-discipline.
•Be the doer, the one who can be counted on to get the job done.
•Learn the joy that comes through accomplishment, and take pride in your work.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn the thrill of the new and the unusual.
•Learn to be versatile and flexible.
•Expect change and the unexpected.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Develop a sense of responsibility.
•Be willing to lend your support and encouragement to those in need of it.
•Learn the difference between helping out and meddling.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Obtain as good an education as possible.
•Seek knowledge, think deeply, and develop intuitions.
•Investigate the unknown in life.
•Read between the lines and not judge by superficial appearances.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Develop drive and ambition.
•Learn to think big and strive for success.
•Learn how to make, save, and accumulate money.
•Develop executive talents - the capacity to manage, organize, direct, and lead.

This person with above birthday needs to:
•Learn to love and serve your fellow man.
•Learn to be a humanitarian.
•Give others your love, sympathy, help, and understanding without thought of reward.
